title: People We Meet on Vacation
author: Emily Henry
description: Poppy and Alex are opposites who vacation together every summer. One trip ruins everything. Can one last getaway fix what was broken?

title: It Ends with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Lily Bloom has always worked hard for the life she wants. When she falls for the charming neurosurgeon Ryle Kincaid, everything seems perfect—until questions about his past and her own childhood re-emerge, testing her strength and love.

title: It Starts with Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: In this sequel to *It Ends with Us*, Lily and Atlas try to navigate their second chance at true love while confronting challenges from their pasts. A heartfelt story of healing, hope, and new beginnings.

title: My Fault
author: Mercedes Ron
description: Noah's life changes when she moves in with her mother's new husband and meets her rebellious stepbrother Nick. Sparks fly, secrets unravel, and emotions run wild in this intense, forbidden romance.

title: Flawless(Book 1)
author: Elsie Silver
description: Rhett Eaton, a rodeo legend, is forced to lay low after a scandal—and his publicist’s daughter is the one tasked with keeping him out of trouble. Sparks fly in this opposites-attract romance.

title: Heartless(Book 2)
author: Elsie Silver
description: Cade Eaton is a single dad who hires Willa, a city girl with no ranching experience, to be his nanny. Their chemistry makes Heartless a small-town romance with a big heart.

title: Powerless(Book 3)
author: Elsie Silver
description: Jasper Gervais, a hockey star with a wild past, reunites with his childhood best friend, Sloane. When a spontaneous road trip turns into something more, their shared history brings unexpected love.

title: Reckless(Book 4)
author: Elsie Silver
description: Theo, the youngest Eaton brother, finds himself entangled with Summer, a woman who’s always been off-limits. A steamy and heartfelt romance that tests their boundaries.

title: Hopeless(Book 5)
author: Elsie Silver
description: The final Chestnut Springs book brings it all home. A grumpy/sunshine love story filled with vulnerability, redemption, and the slowest of slow burns.

title: The Sacred Search
author: Gary Thomas
description: A faith-based guide focusing on marrying for purpose, not just passion.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller about a missing wife and a marriage full of secrets.

title: Harry Potter: The Complete Collection
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The full saga of a young wizard's journey through magic, friendship, and destiny.

title: November 9
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A love story that unfolds one day each year, filled with emotion and twists.

title: Our Fault
author: Mercedes Ron
description: A YA romance full of drama, secrets, and emotional intensity.

title: Your Fault
author: Mercedes Ron
description: The emotional continuation of a passionate and troubled teen romance.

title: The Girl on the Train
author: Paula Hawkins
description: A woman’s daily commute reveals a haunting mystery about love and deception.

title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A chilling thriller where fiction and reality blur in dangerous ways.

title: Watching You
author: Lisa Jewell
description: A neighborhood mystery filled with secrets, lies, and shocking twists.

title: We Were Liars
author: E. Lockhart
description: A suspenseful tale of wealth, lies, and tragedy on a private island.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A coming-of-age mystery about a marsh girl tangled in a murder case.
